panel.title: Convert Phone Numbers to Country and Area

search.query: |inputlookup sampleCalls|eval start=strptime(time,"%H:%M:%S")|eval callid=from.to|eval end=start+duration|eval fields=mvappend(start.":".from,end.":".to)|mvexpand fields|makemv delim=":" fields|eval time=mvindex(fields,0)|eval dn=mvindex(fields,1)|table time dn callid|lookup e164-norm number as dn|

panel.title: Enrich with GeoData and Place Names

search.query: |inputlookup sampleCalls|eval start=strptime(time,"%H:%M:%S")|eval callid=from.to|eval end=start+duration|eval fields=mvappend(start.":".from,end.":".to)|mvexpand fields|makemv delim=":" fields|eval time=mvindex(fields,0)|eval dn=mvindex(fields,1)|table time dn callid|lookup e164-norm number as dn|lookup global-loc countryCode areaCode

|inputlookup sampleCalls|eval start=strptime(time,"%H:%M:%S")|eval callid=from.to|eval end=start+duration|eval fields=mvappend(start.":".from,end.":".to)|mvexpand fields|makemv delim=":" fields|eval time=mvindex(fields,0)|eval dn=mvindex(fields,1)|table time dn callid|lookup e164-norm number as dn|lookup global-loc countryCode areaCode |table time lat lon callid
